content: ***this pattern is available for free on my website visit pattern website link above or you can download it here on ravelry as a printable ad-free pdf *** **difficulty ** intermediate **materials needed ** 6mm j hook or hook needed to obtain gauge 150 yards # 4 worsted weight red heart with love in eggshell and 25 yards red heart with love in light grey yarn needle scissors **stitches used ** chain = chain slip_stitch = slip_stitch single_crochet = single_crochet double_crochet = double_crochet treble_crochet = treble_crochet bpsc = back post single_crochet bphdc = back post half_double_crochet fpsc = front post single_crochet fphdc = front post half_double_crochet fpdc = front post double_crochet decrease = double_crochet 2 together **additional terms ** *puff st * yo pull up a loop 4 times in same st yo pull through 8 loops yo pull through final 2 loops 2dc cluster yo insert hook into stitch pull up a loop yo draw through 2 loops 1st stitch of cluster made yo insert hook into same st pull up a loop yo draw through 2 loops 2nd st of cluster made yo draw through all loops on hook *3dc cluster * yo insert hook into stitch pull up a loop yo draw through 2 loops 1st stitch of cluster made yo insert hook into same st pull up a loop yo draw through 2 loops 2nd st of cluster made yo insert hook into same st pull up a loop yo draw through 2 loops 3rd st of cluster made yo draw through all loops on hook *2tr cluster * yo twice insert hook into stitch pull up a loop yo draw through 2 loops yo draw through 2 loops 1st stitch of cluster made yo twice insert hook into stitch pull up a loop yo draw through 2 loops yo draw through 2 loops 2nd st of cluster made yo draw through all loops on hook st/sts = stitch/stitches space/sps = space/spaces prev = previous **gauge ** 6 across after round 5 **measurements ** 12 x 12 when blocked **additional notes ** -chain 1 at beginning of round does not count as stitch all other chain-1 s count as stitches -use the fp stitches as a guide to help you keep things lined up -this square has some cupping issues blocking is required to get this square to lay well and show off the lace details
